PSoC 6 Peripheral Driver Library
Data Fields
cy_stc_sar_state_backup_t Struct Reference
SAR (SAR ADC Subsystem) » Data Structures

Description

This structure is used by the driver to backup the state of the SAR before entering sleep so that it can be re-enabled after waking up.

Data Fields

uint32_t hwEnabled
 SAR enabled state.
 
uint32_t continuous
 State of the continuous bit.
